text: Tuanigamanuolepola Donny "Tua" Tagovailoa ( ; born March 2, 1998) is an American football quarterback for the Miami Dolphins of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at Alabama, where he was the Offensive MVP of the 2018 College Football Playoff National Championship during his freshman season and won the Maxwell and Walter Camp Awards as a sophomore. == References == Category:1998 births Category:Miami Dolphins players
title: Tua Tagovailoa
